dcterms:description: A large-scale synthetic dataset comprising one million images of text segments for system pre-training and fine-tuning, containing words labeled with a bounding box and six attributes: font, color, italics, bold, underline, and strike.
dcterms:title: SynAttr

dcterms:description: A new large-scale benchmark comprising 5000 images of text segments gathered from real-world document scenes, involving various layouts and styles in English and Chinese, with annotations for contents and bounding boxes of text segments and textual attribute labels.
dcterms:title: Attr-5k

dcterms:creator: Guillaume Jaume
Hazim Kemal Ekenel
Jean-Philippe Thiran
dcterms:description: A dataset for form understanding in noisy scanned documents, consisting of fully annotated forms with various entities.
dcterms:title: FUNSD
